name: verb_generation
description: Words presented, participants read the words. At halfpoint, "GENERATE" is shown, participants need to covertly generate verbs associated with words

name: rest
description: Lie in scanner with a fixation cross

name: tongue_movement
description: move tongue from right to left, touching upper premolar teeth guided by a flashing black circle around a fixation crosshair, black circle means right no cirlce means left, 1s periods
reference: A Third Somatomotor Representation in the Human Cerebellum (Bucknet et al., 2022)
